blogs.title: Researcher arrested over missing lab notebooks

blogs.title: Chronic fatigue syndrome researcher arrested
blogs.summary: A brief update today: I've written twice before about the mistaken hypothesis that chronic fatigue syndrome (CFS) is caused by a virus known as XMRV.  After many followup studies failed to replicate the original findings, other scientists finally determine

author.name: Genomics, Evolution, and Pseudoscience
author.description: This is Steven Salzberg's blog on genomics, evolution, pseudoscience (GenoEvoPseudo), and other topics, including skepticism, open-access publishing, and free software. Here's where I can say what I really think about abuses and distortions of science, especially pseudoscience.

blogs.title: Chronic fatigue syndrome scientist finds a temporary home

blogs.title: Institute claims victory in civil suit against Judy Mikovits
blogs.summary:
Judy Mikovits has lost a civil lawsuit filed by her former employer, the Whittemore Peterson Institute for Neuro-Immune Disease (WPI) in Reno, Nevada.

blogs.title: XMRV paper withdrawn
blogs.summary:
The controversial paper that linked chronic fatigue syndrome to a virus has been withdrawn by Science.

blogs.title: Chronic fatigue syndrome hypothesis collapses further

blogs.title: Chronic fatigue study partially retracted
blogs.summary: The authors of a controversial study linking a retrovirus called XMRV to chronic fatigue syndrome have partially retracted their findings. The retraction was published today by Science, along with another study, conducted by nine independent laboratories,

wikipedia.title: Xenotropic murine leukemia virus-related virus
wikipedia.summary: Xenotropic murine leukemia virus-related virus (XMRV) is a laboratory-derived gammaretrovirus that arose from the recombination of two endogenous mouse retroviruses during the mid 1990s.

wikipedia.title: Judy Mikovits
wikipedia.summary: Judy Anne Mikovits was the research director of the Whittemore Peterson Institute (WPI), a chronic fatigue syndrome (CFS) research organization and clinic in Reno, Nevada, USA.

wikipedia.title: Daniel Peterson (physician)
wikipedia.summary: Daniel Peterson is an American physician in private practice in the state of Nevada, and has been described as a "pioneer" in the treatment of chronic fatigue syndrome (CFS).

news.title: Diebstahl-Vorwurf: Bekannte US-Forscherin muss vor Gericht
news.summary: Es geht um ein mysteriöses Virus, das Chronische Erschöpfungssyndrom - und viel Geld: Die US-Forscherin Judy Mikovits soll Unterlagen ihres Arbeitgebers geklaut haben, saß dafür tagelang im Gefängnis. Sie selbst bestreitet den Vorwurf, nun muss ein Gericht
